title: NIT AP Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in interview for 09 Sports Coaches Posts
description: The National Institute of Technology Andhra Pradesh (NIT Andhra Pradesh) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 09 Sports Coaches Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed Any Degree can apply for the NIT AP Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process...
